tags.name: editable-table-display
tags.description:
`editable-table-display`
` An editor interface for editable-table`

Events:

  * `change` {`CustomEvent<any>`} - 

  * `responsive-element` {`CustomEvent<{ attribute: string; custom: string; element: this; sm: number; md: number; lg: number; xl: number; }>`} - 

  * `responsive-element-deleted` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `filter-column` {`number`} - Index of the current filter column

  * `filtered` {`boolean`} - Whether table is filtered

  * `filter-text` {`string`} - Text for Filtering

  * `selected` {`number`} - Selected column to display when in responsive mode

  * `sort-mode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `sort-column` {`number`} - Index of the current sort column

  * `caption` {`string`} - a table caption

  * `csvData` {`string`} - Raw data pulled in from the csv file.

  * `dataCsv` {`string`} - Location of the CSV file.

  * `bordered` {`boolean`} - Add borders to table and table cells.

  * `column-header` {`boolean`} - Display the first row as a column header.

  * `condensed` {`boolean`} - Condense height of table cells.

  * `data` {`any[]`} - raw data

  * `filter` {`boolean`} - Enable filtering by cell value.

  * `footer` {`boolean`} - Display the last row as a column footer.

  * `row-header` {`boolean`} - Display the first column as a row header.

  * `responsive` {`boolean`} - When table is wider than screens,
users will select a column to display
instead of scrolling across the table.

  * `sort` {`boolean`} - Enable sorting by column header.

  * `striped` {`boolean`} - Add alternating row striping.

  * `responsive-width` {`number`} - width in pixels

  * `responsive-size` {`string`} - size for responsive styling: xs, sm, md, lg, xl

  * `sm` {`number`} - Miniumum value for small breakpoint

  * `md` {`number`} - Miniumum value for medium breakpoint

  * `lg` {`number`} - Miniumum value for large breakpoint

  * `xl` {`number`} - Miniumum value for extra-large breakpoint

Properties:

  * `filterColumn` {`number`} - Index of the current filter column

  * `filtered` {`boolean`} - Whether table is filtered

  * `filterText` {`string`} - Text for Filtering

  * `hidden` {`boolean`} - Hides the table if it has no data

  * `options` {`{ alt: any; value: number; }[][]`} - Gets the columns in `<thead>`

  * `selected` {`number`} - Selected column to display when in responsive mode

  * `sortMode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `sortColumn` {`number`} - Index of the current sort column

  * `caption` {`string`} - a table caption

  * `csvData` {`string`} - Raw data pulled in from the csv file.

  * `dataCsv` {`string`} - Location of the CSV file.

  * `thead` {`any[]`} - Rows in <thead>

  * `tbody` {`any[]`} - Rows in <tbody>

  * `tfoot` {`any[]`} - Rows in <tfoot>

  * `bordered` {`boolean`} - Add borders to table and table cells.

  * `columnHeader` {`boolean`} - Display the first row as a column header.

  * `condensed` {`boolean`} - Condense height of table cells.

  * `data` {`any[]`} - raw data

  * `filter` {`boolean`} - Enable filtering by cell value.

  * `footer` {`boolean`} - Display the last row as a column footer.

  * `rowHeader` {`boolean`} - Display the first column as a row header.

  * `responsive` {`boolean`} - When table is wider than screens,
users will select a column to display
instead of scrolling across the table.

  * `sort` {`boolean`} - Enable sorting by column header.

  * `striped` {`boolean`} - Add alternating row striping.

  * `responsiveWidth` {`number`} - width in pixels

  * `responsiveSize` {`string`} - size for responsive styling: xs, sm, md, lg, xl

  * `sm` {`number`} - Miniumum value for small breakpoint

  * `md` {`number`} - Miniumum value for medium breakpoint

  * `lg` {`number`} - Miniumum value for large breakpoint

  * `xl` {`number`} - Miniumum value for extra-large breakpoint

  * `disableResponsive` {`boolean`} -

tags.name: editable-table-editor-rowcol
tags.description:
`editable-table-editor-rowcol`
A header label and menu for inserting and deleting a row or a column of the editable-table interface (editable-table.html).

Events:

  * `rowcol-action` {`CustomEvent<{ insert: boolean; row: any; index: number; }>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `index` {`number`} - Index of the row or column

  * `row` {`boolean`} - Whether the menu button controls a row

Properties:

  * `index` {`number`} - Index of the row or column

  * `row` {`boolean`} - Whether the menu button controls a row

  * `controls` {`string`} - Gets the first cell that the menu controls

  * `label` {`string`} - Gets row or column label based on type

  * `labelInfo` {`TemplateResult`} - get cell label

  * `type` {`"Row" | "Column"`} - Gets row or column type

attributes.name: index
attributes.description:
`index` {`number`} - Index of the row or column

Property: index

attributes.name: row
attributes.description:
`row` {`boolean`} - Whether the menu button controls a row

Property: row

attributes.name: onrowcol-action
attributes.description: `rowcol-action` {`CustomEvent<{ insert: boolean; row: any; index: number; }>`} -

tags.name: editable-table-editor-toggle
tags.description:
`editable-table-editor-toggle`
A toggle button for an property in the editable-table interface (editable-table.html).

```<editable-table-editor-toggle
hidden                           //Hide and disable this toggle? Default is false.
label="Condensed"                //The label for the toggle button
prop="condensed"                 //The property controlled by this toggle
tooltip="Condense cell height."  //A tooltip for this toggle.
value="true">                    //The value of this toggle.
</editable-table-editor-toggle>```

Events:

  * `change` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `controls` {`string`} - Table id for accessibility

  * `id` {`string`} - Button id that matches the table property to toggle

  * `icon` {`string`} - Button icon

  * `label` {`string`} - Button label

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Whether the button is toggled

Properties:

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

  * `controls` {`string`} - Table id for accessibility

  * `id` {`string`} - Button id that matches the table property to toggle

  * `icon` {`string`} - Button icon

  * `label` {`string`} - Button label

  * `toggled` {`boolean`} - Whether the button is toggled

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
`disabled` {`boolean`} - Whether toggle is disabled

Property: disabled

Default: false

attributes.name: controls
attributes.description:
`controls` {`string`} - Table id for accessibility

Property: controls

Default: table

attributes.name: id
attributes.description:
`id` {`string`} - Button id that matches the table property to toggle

Property: id

Default: null

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description:
`icon` {`string`} - Button icon

Property: icon

Default: null

attributes.name: label
attributes.description:
`label` {`string`} - Button label

Property: label

Default: null

attributes.name: toggled
attributes.description:
`toggled` {`boolean`} - Whether the button is toggled

Property: toggled

Default: false

attributes.name: onchange
attributes.description: `change` {`CustomEvent<this>`} -

  * `filtered` {`boolean`} - Whether the column is filtered

  * `text` {`string`} - Column header text

tags.name: editable-table-editor-sort
tags.description:
`editable-table-editor-sort`
A column header that functions as a three-state sort button (no sort, sort ascending, sort descending) for the table-editor-display mode (table-editor-display.html).

Events:

  * `change-sort-mode` {`CustomEvent<this>`} - 

Attributes:

  * `column-index` {`number`} - Sort ascending, descending or none

  * `sort-mode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `text` {`string`} - Column header text

  * `sort-column` {`number`} - Index of the current sort column

Properties:

  * `columnIndex` {`number`} - Sort ascending, descending or none

  * `sorting` {`boolean`} - Whether the column is being sorted

  * `sortMode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

  * `text` {`string`} - Column header text

  * `sortColumn` {`number`} - Index of the current sort column

attributes.name: column-index
attributes.description:
`column-index` {`number`} - Sort ascending, descending or none

Property: columnIndex

attributes.name: sort-mode
attributes.description:
`sort-mode` {`string`} - Sort mode: ascending, descending or none

Property: sortMode

Default: none

attributes.name: text
attributes.description:
`text` {`string`} - Column header text

Property: text

Default:

attributes.name: sort-column
attributes.description:
`sort-column` {`number`} - Index of the current sort column

Property: sortColumn

Default: -1

attributes.name: onchange-sort-mode
attributes.description: `change-sort-mode` {`CustomEvent<this>`} -
